modName: Playable Giant's club - (Previous name was  usable giant's club)
summary: A simple mod to allow the player to use a giant's club.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2016/44/1478297540-playable-giant-s-clubpetit.png[/img]

[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2016/44/1478375250-separator-pointe.png[/img][/center][size=4]
[font=Arial][color=#efefef]So, this mod allow the player to take a giantclub in his inventory and equip it like a two-handed sword or a Mace. It make the giant's club usable like a weapon.[/color]
[color=#efefef]No, you can't play AS the giant's club...[/color]
[color=#efefef]To take a giant's club you just need to kill one of them, open his inventory and take a giant giant's club.[/color]
[color=#efefef]There exist a Skyrim Special Edition version of this mod (Scroll down)[/color]

[color=#efefef]There is actually 2 mods available :[/color]
[color=#efefef]- GreatSword Handling[/color]
[color=#efefef]- WarHammer Handling[/color]

[color=#ff0000]⚠[/color][color=#efefef] - [/color][color=#cc4125]Make sure you don't have the 2 versions of this mod installed, the game will crash.[/color][/font][font=Arial]
[/font][/size][center][font=Arial][size=4]
[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2016/44/1478375250-separator-pointe.png[/img]

[/size][img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2016/44/1478376040-how-to-install.png[/img][/font][/center][font=Arial][size=4]
1 - [color=#f1c232]Drop the ESP file into the Skyrim's Data folder. [/color]or
1b - [color=#f1c232]You can also use NMM or MO.[/color]
[color=#ffffff]2 -[/color][color=#a61c00] [/color][color=#f1c232]Play and enjoy[/color] =]

[/size][/font][center][font=Arial][img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2016/44/1478376040-this-mod.png[/img][/font][/center][font=Arial][size=4]
- [color=#6aa84f]Is compatible with all the other ones.
[/color]- [color=#6aa84f]Is compatible with all versions of skyrim.
[/color]- [color=#6aa84f]Do not requires SKSE.
[/color]- [color=#6aa84f]Do not requires any DLC.[/color]

[/size][/font][center][font=Arial][img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2016/44/1478376040-credits.png[/img][/font][/center][font=Arial]
[size=4]- [/size][color=#3c78d8][size=4]VirtualSoul for creating this mod.[/size][/color] [color=#efefef][size=2](aka TheGEEK25, my (old) worst nickname)[/size]
[/color][size=4]- [/size][color=#3c78d8][size=4]Bethesda for Skyrim.[/size]
[/color][size=4]- [/size][color=#3c78d8][size=4]Bethesda for Creation Kit.[/size][/color][color=#3c78d8]

[center][img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2016/44/1478375250-separator-pointe.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/3013?][img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2016/44/1478378725-woodspecialeditionversion.png[/img][/url]

[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2016/44/1478375250-separator-pointe.png[/img][/center][/color][size=1][center]Hey ! Don't forget to endorse if you like my mod =][/center][/size][/font]
author: Virtual5oul
